main event: A round, white light approximately the size of a basketball was observed at Tachikawa AB, Japan, moving at a high rate of speed before climbing out of sight.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes,The object approached the observer and leveled off at about 500 feet,It accelerated quickly and climbed out of sight,The weather conditions were clear with no cloud cover,The witness is described as a reliable source and familiar with aircraft.
witness description: all observers are aircraft mechanics and familiar with aircraft in flight
